text: “Ndipo tidakuphimbani ndi mthunzi wa mitambo (pamene mudali kuoloka chipululu cha mchenga), ndipo tidakutsitsirani Mana (zakumwa zotsekemera ngati uchi) ndi Salwa (zinziri), ndi kukuuzani: “Idyani zinthu zabwino izi zimene takupatsani.” Komatu sadatichitire Ife choipa koma adali kudzichitira okha zoipa
